hero.role: Full Stack Developer | Systems Student | IT Educator
hero.description: Passionate about technology, education, and continuous learning. I create innovative solutions and share knowledge through teaching and development.

about.title: About Me

intro.paragraph1: I'm Martín Lucero, a creator of digital experiences, Web and Mobile Developer, and passionate about data analysis and artificial intelligence. From General Rodríguez, Buenos Aires, I transform ideas into technological solutions that empower businesses and improve people's lives.
intro.paragraph2: With solid knowledge in Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and SQL, I develop responsive web applications, automation scripts and data analysis with a practical approach. I also have experience in interface design, digital marketing and search engine optimization (SEO).
intro.paragraph3: I'm currently training in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence, while participating in real projects and continuing to grow as an IT professional.

teachingDegree.title: Teaching Degree in Computer Science

aiDiploma.title: Diploma in Generative Artificial Intelligence
aiDiploma.description: Practical training in generative AI, GCP, BigQuery and Gemini.

about.description: I'm a dedicated full-stack developer and systems engineering student with a passion for creating meaningful technology solutions. My journey combines formal education with hands-on experience in web development, artificial intelligence, and educational technology.
about.experience: My experience spans from building responsive web applications to developing AI-powered chatbots for academic institutions. I believe in the power of technology to transform education and am committed to bridging the gap between complex technical concepts and practical applications.
about.teaching: As an IT educator, I've had the privilege of teaching programming fundamentals and web development to aspiring developers. This experience has not only enhanced my communication skills but also deepened my understanding of technology from multiple perspectives.
about.philosophy: I approach every project with curiosity, attention to detail, and a commitment to quality. Whether it's developing a full-stack application or mentoring students, I strive to create solutions that are both technically sound and user-friendly.

fullstack-freelance.description: Design and development of custom web solutions with focus on user experience and responsiveness, managing the complete project lifecycle from conceptualization to implementation.
responsibilities: Web application development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React and Node.js
Implementation of dynamic functionalities and interactive systems
results: Functional ecommerce for local hardware store with catalog, cart and order management
Web platform for automotive workshop with online appointment system
Interactive web portfolios for professionals, artists and students
Digital process optimization for General Rodríguez Health Department

interpreter.description: Simultaneous and consecutive Spanish–English interpretation in high-responsibility environments, along with editing and synchronization of musical content under international standards.
responsibilities: Simultaneous and consecutive interpretation in medical, legal and public service environments
Editing and synchronization of song lyrics in Spanish and English
Management of sensitive conversations with linguistic precision
Compliance with international standards and delivery deadlines

educator.description: Teaching in digital literacy and programming mentorship, promoting digital inclusion and technical skills development in diverse learning groups.
responsibilities: Basic computer education for older adults
Guidance in real projects and best practices

entrepreneur.description: Comprehensive management of commercial venture in construction materials, developing business and commercial skills in a competitive environment.
responsibilities: Stock, pricing and distribution logistics management
Development of commercial relationships and after-sales

moreAbout.title: More about me

quote.text: I believe in more human technology: that empowers people, not replaces them.
quote.author: – Martín Lucero

moreAbout.philosophy: I'm passionate about continuous learning, collaborative work and solving real problems with technology. Beyond code, I seek to generate impact, share knowledge and build a more just, open and digital world.

testimonials.title: What they say about my work

testimonial1.text: Martín demonstrated great technical ability and creativity in developing our project. His focus on user experience is exceptional.
testimonial1.name: Juan Pérez

testimonial2.text: His passion for teaching and technology is reflected in every project. Always willing to share knowledge and help the team.
testimonial2.name: Ana Martínez
